title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Other Resources
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Other Resources              Other Resources       If you are interested in resources, from other National Parks in New York State or anywhere in the country, it is suggested you visit some of the following web pages:           National Park Service  Honored Places: The National Park Service Teacher's Guide to the American Revolution           The NPS Interpretation and Education webpage at: www.nps.gov/learn      Teaching with Historic Places (TWHP) uses properties listed in the National Park Service's National Register of Historic Places to create a variety of products and activities that help teachers bring historic places into the classroom. webpage at:  www.nps.gov/history/nr/twhp           Free educational information from the Federal Resources for Educational Excellence, Teaching and Learning Resources from Federal Agencies website can be found here: http://free.ed.gov/           Trying to learn more about the process of government? Why not try Ben's Guide to US Government for Kids webpage at: http://bensguide.gpo.gov/      return to:  top of page   For Teacher's Main Page  Fort Stanwix National Monument Main Page
